entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
